certifications.title: Google Cybersecurity
certifications.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity certification covering security fundamentals, network security, and threat detection.

certifications.title: Coursera Foundations of Cybersecurity
certifications.description: Foundation course covering core cybersecurity concepts, principles, and best practices.

certifications.title: Coursera Automate Cybersecurity Tasks with Python
certifications.description: Learn to automate cybersecurity tasks using Python programming, including scripting and automation techniques.

certifications.title: Coursera Sound the Alarm
certifications.description: Security monitoring and incident detection course focusing on identifying and responding to security threats.

certifications.title: Coursera Assets, Threats, and Vulnerabilities
certifications.description: Understanding security assets, identifying threats, and assessing vulnerabilities in systems and networks.

certifications.title: Coursera Linux and SQL
certifications.description: Comprehensive course on Linux system administration and SQL database management.

certifications.title: Coursera Connect and Protect
certifications.description: Network security fundamentals covering secure connections and protection mechanisms.

certifications.title: Coursera Play It Safe: Manage Security Risks
certifications.description: Security risk management course covering risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and compliance.

certifications.title: Coursera Put It to Work: Prepare for Cybersecurity Jobs
certifications.description: Career preparation course for cybersecurity roles, including resume building and interview skills.

certifications.title: Computer Networks and Internet Protocol
certifications.description: Deep dive into computer networks, TCP/IP protocols, and internet infrastructure.

certifications.title: Coursera 2MWW3JUREHI
certifications.description: Coursera certification course covering advanced topics in technology and development.

certifications.title: IT Automation
certifications.description: IT automation techniques using scripting and automation tools for system administration.

certifications.title: Coursera Certificate (250410-229540)
certifications.description: Professional development certification from Coursera covering industry-relevant skills.

certifications.title: UC-b931250c-10-4397-9ec0-5d-pae92b8a92
certifications.description: Online learning certification demonstrating commitment to continuous professional development.

wittyTaglines: Skills evolve. Certificates show the journey.
Learning never stops. These are just the milestones.
Proof that I practice what I preach.
